get.summary: Search modules based on a prefix
Search modules condensed based on a prefix
Suggest modules from selected nodes of a graph
For each module in the graph, checks if graph contains sufficient pre-reqs.

post.description: Performs user login. If there is no associated user in the database, creates a user with an empty degree and empty graph.

patch.summary: Set main degree of a user
Removes a degree from a user
Set the main graph of a user
Removes a graph from a user
Sets module status of a user
